tool_input.content:
--- theme: ../ layout: default ---

The Skill Issue

Agentic Coding in 2026

Scan to Follow Along

--- layout: default --- # The Problem

90% AI Adoption, Zero Standardization

  • +20% PRs per author, +23.5% incidents per PR, +30% change failure rate

"AI Amplifies Whatever You Have"

  • Good practices become great. Bad practices become catastrophic.

I've Seen This Firsthand

  • Client project: UI engineer using Cursor without understanding the patterns
  • Result: 5000+ line files, hardcoded strings, 20 components per file
  • Not his fault - he didn't know what he was doing

--- layout: default --- # The Proof

+114,427 Lines of Code Added

  • Production systems, not demos

~$864 Spent on Claude Code

  • Total cost for the tooling

$23,480 Income (December)

  • Real money from real systems

"95% of the code was written by AI"

  • I just figured out how to encode my engineering knowledge so the AI can use it

--- layout: default --- # What is a Skill?

Opinionated Markdown Files

  • A structured way to format documentation that agents can understand

Self-Discovery

  • Agent can discover and acquire processes within the skill on-demand

Becoming Standard

  • Anthropic recently released this structure - it's becoming the standard

Not Complicated

  • You already have the knowledge - skills just encode it properly
